text: Hawaii Calls is an compilation album of phonograph records put together by Decca Records in 1941 featuring Decca's best Hawaiian music. ==Track listing== These previously issued songs were featured on a 5-disc, 78 rpm album set, Decca Album No. 193. Harry Owens is the main performer for Disc 1, as Bing Crosby is for Disc 2 and Frances Langford backed by Dick McIntire are for Discs 3 and 4, while Dick McIntire is the main performer for Disc 5. Disc 1: (1265) Disc 2: (3299) Disc 3: (3046) Disc 4: (3047) Disc 5: (3048) ==References== Category:Bing Crosby compilation albums Category:1941 compilation albums Category:Decca Records compilation albums Category:Hawaiian music Category:Frances Langford compilation albums
title: Hawaii Calls (album)
